sentences.en: A mixture of a metal with its sulfides, produced by smelting the sulfide ores of copper, lead, or nickel.
sentences.cn: 锍，冰铜一种带有硫化物的金属混合物，由熔炼铜、铅或镍的硫化物矿石而制成。

sentences.en: An ore - refining process, such as smelting, dependent on the action of heat.
sentences.cn: 热冶,火法冶金一种冶炼矿石的程序, 如''.'熔炼'.'', 它依靠热的作用.

sentences.en: As a native metal, gold required no extraction by smelting.
sentences.cn: 作为一种天然的金属, 黄金不需要熔炼提取.

sentences.en: Class A: rock ore appraisal and testing; mineral smelting and processing.
sentences.cn: 83700671甲级: 岩矿鉴定与岩矿测试, 选冶加工试验.

sentences.en: Darby was looking for a way to improve iron when he hit upon the idea of smelting it with coke instead of charcoal.
sentences.cn: 达比一直在寻找改善铁质的方法，他猛然想到可以不用木炭熔炼，而改用焦炭。

sentences.en: Demage mechanism of tap - hole for a ferro silico - manganese smelting furnace is described.
sentences.cn: 阐述了锰 硅合金 矿热炉出铁口损坏的机理.

sentences.en: Fire provided a means of smelting ores.
sentences.cn: 火提供了熔炼矿石的手段.

sentences.en: Guimeng alloys, an electric high - carbon, ferromanganese, low ferromanganese smelting sales.
sentences.cn: 硅锰合金 、 电炉高碳 、 锰铁 、 低度锰铁冶炼销售.

sentences.en: Imperial Smelting Furnace ( ISF ) smelting process is a quite complex process.
sentences.cn: 密闭 鼓风炉 的熔炼过程极其复杂,工艺结构庞大.

sentences.en: Inside, coking , sintering and smelting plants churned out crude iron and steel.
sentences.cn: 在这道门里, 焦化和冶炼工厂源源不断地产出生铁和钢材.

sentences.en: Our products are widely used in Smelting, Chemical industry, Electroplating, Decorating etc.
sentences.cn: 我们的产品广泛应用于冶炼, 化工, 电镀, 装饰等.

sentences.en: Smelting and casting a liquefied natural gas on clean energy.
sentences.cn: 压铸采用集中熔炼和液化天然气清洁能源.

sentences.en: The paper introduces the nickel smelting blast furnace control system.
sentences.cn: 介绍了某镍冶炼厂鼓风炉控制系统.

sentences.en: The possibility of the smelting technology and its application are discussed.
sentences.cn: 研讨了冶炼工艺及应用的可行性.

sentences.en: This paper briefly expounds the technological design and smelting process of ZCuZn 40 Mn 3 Fel.
sentences.cn: 主要论述了锰黄铜熔炼工艺设计及熔炼过程.

sentences.en: When he said smelting, I said, OK, you got it.
sentences.cn: 当他说熔炼，我会说，好，你明白了。

trans.tran_cn: 熔炼，提炼（矿石）( smelt的现在分词 )
